name: Superman
Abilities: Super strength, speed, agility, senses, durability, and the power of flight. Heat vision, freeze breath, X-ray vision, and superhuman hearing.

name: Batman
Abilities: Genius-level intellect, peak human physical condition, exceptional martial arts skills, advanced technology, and detective skills.

name: Wonder Woman
Abilities: Super strength, speed, agility, reflexes, durability, and the power of flight. Exceptional combat skills, healing factor, and a lasso of truth.

name: The Flash
Abilities: Superhuman speed, agility, reflexes, and endurance. Time travel, the ability to phase through objects, and generate sonic booms.

name: Green Lantern
Abilities: Power ring: creates constructs of solid light, flight, and force fields. Ability to overcome fear, exceptional willpower, and skill as a pilot.

name: Aquaman
Abilities: Super strength, speed, agility, reflexes, durability, and the ability to breathe underwater. Telepathic communication with sea creatures and control over water.

name: Cyborg
Abilities: Cybernetic enhancements: Super strength, speed, durability, and the ability to interface with computers. Advanced weaponry and hacking abilities.

name: Green Arrow
Abilities: Exceptional archery skills, martial arts, and detective skills. Wealth and access to advanced technology.
